articles.content: The Minnesota Department of Health reported seven new cases of COVID-19 in St. Louis County on Sunday.Of the 461 new cases the state reported, no other cases were reported in Northeastern Minnesota.… [+1210 chars]

articles.title: 2nd wave of coronavirus cases? Experts say we're still in the 1st - Alabama's News Leader
articles.description: What's all this talk about a “second wave” of U. S. coronavirus cases? In The Wall Street Journal last week, Vice President Mike Pence wrote in a piece headlined “There Isn’t a Coronavirus ‘Second Wave'" that the nation is winnin…
